column2: A banker who is sentenced to life in Shawshank State Prison
Leonard (Guy Pearce) is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife.
Depicts a dystopian future in which reality as perceived by most humans is actually a simulated reality called the Matrix.
An illusion gone horribly wrong pits two 19th-century magicians against each other.
Theodore (Joaquin Phoenix) becomes fascinated with a new operating system which reportedly develops into an intuitive and unique entity in its own right.
